section.content: Half Rectifier - Experiment Take a diode, and Load resistor of 1KOhms.Connect to AC Voltage Source of 50 Hz , 2 VConnect Oscilloscope and Ground. Run simulation.

section.title: Half Rectifier - Results
section.content: Half Rectifier - Results Double Click on Oscilloscope to view results. In half wave rectification, either the positive or negative half of the AC wave is passed, while the other half is blocked. Because only one half of the input waveform reaches the output, it is very inefficient if used for power transfer.
